# commit()

**Type Method**

Commit all changes made during the current transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
class func commit()
```

## Discussion

Raises an exception if no current transaction exists.

## Creating and Committing Transactions

- **begin()**: Begin a new transaction for the current thread.
- **flush()**: Flushes any extant implicit transaction.

items.description: Begin a new transaction for the current thread.
